title: Design AKS Terraform Module Architecture
description: Define VNet topology, subnet segregation, and node pool specifications for system and user pools.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & Identity Foundation
acceptance_criteria: VNet design document approved; CIDR ranges allocated
definition_of_done: Architecture diagram updated; Peer review complete

title: Implement AKS Terraform Configuration
description: Write Terraform HCL to provision AKS, including OIDC issuer enabling, Azure CNI networking, and RBAC integration.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & Identity Foundation
acceptance_criteria: Terraform apply successful; Cluster accessible via kubectl

title: Implement PostgreSQL Terraform with PostGIS
description: Define Terraform resource for Flexible Server, enable 'postgis' extension, and configure high availability.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & Identity Foundation

title: Configure Passport JWT Strategy for Azure AD B2C
description: Implement the passport-jwt strategy to validate tokens against the B2C issuer and audience configuration.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & Identity Foundation
definition_of_done: Unit tests passing; Mock B2C integration verified

title: Implement Roles Guard and Decorator
description: Create custom @Roles() decorator and guard to enforce RBAC based on JWT claims.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & Identity Foundation
acceptance_criteria: Decorator applies metadata; Guard blocks unauthorized access

title: Design Local Database Schema & Sync Strategy
description: Define WatermelonDB schema and conflict resolution strategy for offline-first architecture.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & Identity Foundation
acceptance_criteria: Schema diagram approved; Sync protocol defined

title: Define State Machine Logic and Interfaces
description: Define the state enum, permitted transitions, and interface definitions for service request lifecycle.
sprint_goal: Core Business Logic & Offline Mobile Architecture

title: Implement WatermelonDB Setup and Models
description: Install WatermelonDB, configure native adapters, and implement Model classes.
sprint_goal: Core Business Logic & Offline Mobile Architecture

title: Implement PostGIS Geometry Columns
description: Create migration for geometry columns and update TypeORM entities for geospatial data.
sprint_goal: Core Business Logic & Offline Mobile Architecture

title: Implement Network Monitor and Request Queue
description: Create service to monitor network and queue offline writes to local DB.
sprint_goal: Core Business Logic & Offline Mobile Architecture
acceptance_criteria: Offline writes queued; Network changes detected

title: Setup NestJS WebSocket Gateway with Redis Adapter
description: Initialize Gateway and configure Redis Adapter for Pub/Sub scaling.
acceptance_criteria: Gateway accepts connections; Broadcasts scale across pods

title: Configure React Native App Auth
description: Integrate react-native-app-auth with Azure AD B2C.

title: Implement Secure Token Storage with Biometric Access
description: Implement encrypted storage for tokens protected by Biometric prompt.
acceptance_criteria: Tokens stored encrypted; Biometrics required for access
definition_of_done: Tested on FaceID and Fingerprint devices

title: Implement WebSocket Authentication Guard
description: Secure WS connection using JWT strategy.
